trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] WorkflowRoleCollection provides programmatic access to check whether an identity associated with a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> has been added to a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> or <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]WorkflowRoleCollection fornece acesso programático para verificar se uma identidade associada com um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole>foi adicionado a um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>ou <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebServiceInputActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRoleCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRoleCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRoleCollection"></xref> contains the specified identity.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRoleCollection"> </xref> contém a identidade especificada.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the identity for which to search.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a identidade que deseja pesquisar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRoleCollection"></xref> contains the identity; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRoleCollection"> </xref> contém a identidade; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
